text: Rincewind wondered who'd said that, and there's the end of the passage. #LastContinent

passages.fragment: Rincewind wondered who 'd said that , and
passages.full_quote: <used>Rincewind wondered who'd said that, and</used> realized it was him
"Yes, Mr. Aggy <used>said that, and there's</used> talk, sir"
"And now you've won, <used>and there's the end of</used> it," said Granny
"But that<used>'s the end of the</used> world!"
But what there was, at <used>the end of the passage</used>, was a haze of blue smoke
